name: A Pretty Vampire Girl Makeover - Spa MakeUp Salon Free
name_original: A Pretty Vampire Girl Makeover - Spa MakeUp Salon Free
description:
Dracy is count Dracula's youngest daughter. Always with her pale skin, fangs and big, wondering eyes, dressed in black outfits that she cheers up with electric pink Dracy craves for a total makeover!

Dare to enter in Draculaura's haunted castle, be her stylista and give her a totally new Gothic makeover! So, how about starting your job as Draculaura's precious stylista by choosing a new hairstyle for her?

It should remain long and dyed in black with some shades of electric pink, so check out the new hairdos available in this game and pick out the one you like best of all for her.

Great! Now let's apply some bits of color on her pale skin using one of those professional foundations you have at your disposal in this game and then finish off the makeup session by choosing the best color for her eyeshadow!

One more step and her transformation is complete!! She needs some accessories, too so make sure you pick out the ones that best complement the chosen outfit! Let your imagination go crazy, so she can enjoy a total makeover from you. Enjoy!
